text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

Greetings from the
MBA Admissions team
at Harvard Business School.

This Application
Tips video series

is meant to help you
understand what we're
looking for in the application.

While it is important to us
that our students' perspectives

and aspirations vary, they
all share the same three
characteristics.

Our students are
business-minded,

leadership-focused,
and growth-oriented.

We look holistically at
your provided information

and materials to understand
what voice you would bring

to Harvard Business School,
what kind of community member

you would be, and what
potential impact you
could make after you graduate.

Through this video series,
the Admissions team

will walk through each
piece of the application

and provide some
thoughts and advice that
are hopefully helpful to you.

Use this as an
opportunity to reflect,

and feel free to watch these
videos in whatever order
benefits you.

For more information, visit
our Application Process page

or follow us on
Instagram, @HBSAdmissions.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
